definition: to talk rubbish
surname Hu
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
beard/mustache/whiskers
see 衚衕|胡同[hu2 tong4]
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
variant of 說|说[shuo1]
eight/8

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.chinese: 全是胡说八道，我写的东西。

sentences.english: Don't run your mind games on me, that's my number! What's this bozo 's name?
sentences.chinese: 别对我胡说八道，这是我的号码，那家伙叫什么名字？

sentences.english: Her silly talk verged on nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 她的蠢话近乎胡说八道。

sentences.english: Or as my younger son would say, fudge knuckle.
sentences.chinese: 或者像我的小儿子会说的一样，胡说八道。

sentences.english: I don't know what b. s. you guys are saying lol.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你们在胡说八道什么。

sentences.english: The idea that some cigarettes are healthier than others is a whole lot of malarkey .
sentences.chinese: 有些香烟比其它香烟更健康的这种想法全是胡说八道。

sentences.english: I pray you, sir, what saucy merchant was this, that was so full of his ropery?
sentences.chinese: 先生，这个满嘴胡说八道的放肆家伙是谁？

sentences.english: This is what its members claim. It's nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 这是其成员的话，简直是胡说八道。

sentences.english: It's fun to hear her gabble .
sentences.chinese: 听听她那一套胡说八道也是好玩的。

sentences.english: Don't Listen to their nonsense, here is no thing love which.
sentences.chinese: 别听她们胡说八道，根本就没那回事。

sentences.english: Oh, I never heard of such nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我从没听说过这种胡说八道。

sentences.english: We suspect that there will be all sorts of self-justifying guff from them.
sentences.chinese: 我怀疑这里会充满各式各样胡说八道的自我辩白。

sentences.english: Codswallop, in my opinion. Nope, I reckon he's out there still too tirend to carry on.
sentences.chinese: 但依我看是胡说八道，不，我想他还躲在某个地方。

sentences.english: Well, nothing like that has happened—it's complete nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 呃，那样的事情从未发生过，完全是胡说八道。

definition: to talk nonsense/drivel
to chatter/nonsense/blather
babbling nonsense (idiom); crazy and unfounded ravings/double Dutch
to speak off the cuff/to casually opine
a bunch of nonsense
to talk drivel/to assert sth without a proper understanding or basis in fact/not to know what one is talking about
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
to speak without thinking/to blurt sth out
crazy talk/ravings/nonsense
to spit blood (idiom); venomous slander/malicious attacks
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
nonsense/humbug/bunk/bullshit
to boast shamelessly/to talk big
to act willfully and make a scene/to make trouble
to twist words and force logic (idiom)/sophistry/loud rhetoric making up for fallacious argument/shoving false arguments down people's throats
